author: TylerLeonhardt
body:
Meta issue here. Feel free to close. 

I've noticed a lot of big projects that have a solid following tag certain issues with a tag such as "first-time contributors" or "good first bug". 

The idea is that new people (like myself) who want to contribute but don't really know how or where to get started have a place to start.

It'd be really sweet if the Powershell repo had this!

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: While there's not a particular label "easy" issues, we use [`up-for-grabs`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3AUp-for-Grabs) for the sorts of issues that anyone can feel free to pick up.

title: [Meta] Tag issues for new contributors to work on
